name: quizmaster-v2
description: Quiz Master V2 - Complete Development Environment

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:redis" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:celery-worker" "npm run dev:celery-beat" "npm run dev:frontend" --names "Redis,Backend,Celery-Worker,Celery-Beat,Frontend" --prefix-colors "red,blue,magenta,cyan,green"
scripts.kill:all: pkill -f "python.*run.py" && pkill -f "celery.*worker" && pkill -f "celery.*beat" && pkill -f "vite.*5175" && pkill -f "npm.*dev" && pkill -f "redis-server"
scripts.setup: cd backend && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build

author: Aaryan Choudhary
